abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the facilities
            necessary to allow large long-range jet aircraft to operate
            economically from Dakar International Airport. It would
            comprise: (i) the lengthening of the main runway from 2,900
            meters to 3,550 meters, (ii) the provision of lighting for
            the extended runway, (iii) the construction of two
            additional aircraft parking positions, and (iv) the
            relocation of the Instrument Landing System localizer.
